attributes.review: Broke my legs couldn’t walk!!! Downloaded this app to support the fat pedo racist  president and next thing you know I am getting my legs broken!!!! He had his special servants break my legs😡😡😡 Going to press chargers on him once I get the chance!!!! 😡😡😡Very disappointed 😡😡😡😡 App is not good don’t recommend they also broke my phone typed this off of a track phone 😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: App broke my legs 😡😡😡

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it stole my credit card information and made me pay for a monthly subscription to support his campaign. I thought this app was free and that America was free, why do I have to pay for this!!! When on the phone with customer service the representative told me that I should go to hell. Not the greatest customer service
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I have very fast WiFi and all of the apps I’ve previously downloaded took less than 30 seconds to download while this app took an hour. Once I finally got into the app my phone began to glitch and I couldn’t get out of the app unless I completely turned my phone off. This app is horrible
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded

attributes.review: Okay I downloaded this app to support our Cheeto president and I was appalled on how terrible it was. First of all it’s too big so it took absolutely too long to download then ad’s would pop up every five seconds. And I’ll top of that he gave me four viruses and on my phone does not work properly add this could be terrible do not download it.
attributes.title: The is the absolute worst app

attributes.review: 1) it took FOREVER👿 to download I couldn’t even do anything else while it was downloading🙄 2) it glitched out my phone 👺and I was so excited to see my president but all I saw was a rat painted orange 😔🤮 3)once it glitched it started showing me naked pictures of someone’s grandma 😰and I couldn’t do anything about it 🧍🏽‍♂️this is such a terrible app -7/10 would recommend 👎🏼
attributes.title: worst app EVER

attributes.review: This app completely destroyed my phone! I’m typing off my old one! I downloaded it only to have my phone crash and then blow up??! I have no idea what kind of software this is but it should not be downloaded by anyone if they care about their iPhone. I can’t believe the App Store still has it knowing well that it destroys their products.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app is so bad I literally downloaded the app and I couldn’t even open any other app it would keep crashing everything besides this app and when I wanted to open my safari to search something up it would spam my phone with ads on any website worst app on the App Store
attributes.title: Horrible app, all lives matter
attributes.userName: this app is trash one star

attributes.review: i was told i won a free yard sign. i clicked on the link and in order to receive my sign i had to make a $20 donation. i’m not surprised that our president doesn’t understand the definition of “free”, but i am very disappointed by this. i was going to paint BLM over the sign and stick it in my trump-supporting neighbor’s yard😞 yet again i am personally affected by trumps empty promises.
attributes.title: very disappointed

attributes.review: this app took weeks to download and when it finally downloaded it crashed my phone and change the settings to Russian. I had to get a whole new phone and when I did I downloaded it again. this app’s vibrations sent rats all in to my house now my whole family has the bubonic plague. very disappointed
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it made my phone glitch for a week until I finally deleted it. Even worse the app was full of fake news and racist, sexist, and pro communist information and words. As much as I wanted to support this app, I just couldn't. I would not recommend this app to anyone. It's glitchy and filled with fiction.
attributes.title: Horrible App
